      • getDoctorWorkDaysStatistic

        @Query(value="SELECT DATE, count(*) as visits, sum(DURATION) as duration FROM MEDICAL_RECORD join APPOINTMENT on MEDICAL_RECORD.APPOINTMENT_ID = APPOINTMENT.ID where MEDICAL_RECORD.DOCTOR_ID = ?1 and APPOINTMENT.DATE >= ?2 and APPOINTMENT.DATE <= ?3 group by DATE order by DATE",
       nativeQuery=true)
